decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's actions through counterspells, removal spells, board wipes, and card draw. It uses cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Shark Typhoon to generate value and pressure the opponent. The mana base is designed to support the control strategy and ensure consistent access to all colors. The inclusion of Kaheera as a companion provides an additional value engine. The deck aims to outlast the opponent by efficiently answering threats and eventually overwhelming them with powerful spells and creatures.
